Trade/Device Name(s): Puritan Opti-Tranz Cary-Blair Collection and Transport System
Puritan® Opti-Tranz™ Cary-Blair Collection and Transport System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Puritan Opti-Tranz Cary-Blair Collection and Transport System used for collection and transport of fecal and rectal swab specimens to maintain enteric bacteria viability.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the collection and transport of clinical fecal and rectal swab specimens to preserve the viability of enteric bacteria during transport from the collection site to the testing laboratory for bacteriological examination and culture.
